title: Intergalactic Era of Gossip - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Xuanhuan
tags: Aristocracy   Cold Love Interests   Enemies Become Lovers   Famous Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Outer Space   Persistent Love Interests   Secret Identity   Tsundere   Unreliable Narrator
author: Shang Ling   上灵
description:
The Honored Prince’s dignity must not be encroached.

The news of him being slept by his sworn rival definitely can’t be discovered by others!

Why the fuck was the entire Empire helping that guy search for his one night stand?

Steady, don’t panic.

Just refute it to death.>
